sentences.en: A conservative estimate of the bill, so far, is about £22,000.
sentences.cn: 到目前为止，这笔账单保守估计大约为2.2万英镑。

sentences.en: At least one estimate puts the total tab at $7 million.
sentences.cn: 至少有一个估价把总数定在了700万美元。

sentences.en: Did the engineer estimate for building the bridge?
sentences.cn: 那位工程师估计建桥的费用了 吗 ?

sentences.en: Her estimate was right on the nose.
sentences.cn: 她的估计十分准确.

sentences.en: I can give you a rough estimate of the amount of wood you will need.
sentences.cn: 我可以粗略估计一下你所需要的木材量。

sentences.en: I estimate his age at thirty - five.
sentences.cn: 我估计他年龄在35岁.

sentences.en: I estimate that the total cost for treatment will be $12,500.
sentences.cn: 我估计治疗费用总共会有12,500美元。

sentences.en: I estimate that total cost for treatment will go from $9,000 to $12,500.
sentences.cn: 我估计治疗费总额将在9千美元到1.25万美元之间。

sentences.en: I hadn't been far wrong in my estimate of his grandson's capabilities.
sentences.cn: 我对他孙子的能力的判断还不算太离谱。

sentences.en: I hadn't been far wrong in my estimate.
sentences.cn: 我过去的估计大致正确。

sentences.en: Its own estimate of three hundred tallies with that of another survey.
sentences.cn: 其估计数目300与另一项调查的结果相吻合。

sentences.en: Some analysts estimate its current popularity at around ten per cent.
sentences.cn: 一些分析家估计它现在的普及率在10%左右。

sentences.en: The garage said they’d send me an estimate for the work.
sentences.cn: 汽车修理厂说他们会给我寄来维修报价。

sentences.en: The lowest estimate would put the worth of the jewel at ＄200.
sentences.cn: 按最低的评估这块宝石也值200美元.

sentences.en: The painter's estimate for painting the whole house was 1000 dollars.
sentences.cn: 油漆匠对油刷整个房子的估价是1000美元.

sentences.en: The tree is estimated to be at least 700 years old.
sentences.cn: 这棵树估计至少有700年树龄。

sentences.en: This figure is five times the original estimate.
sentences.cn: 这个数据是最初估算的5倍。

sentences.en: Try to estimate how many steps it will take to get to a close object.
sentences.cn: 估计一下需要多少步才能到达一个近距目标。

sentences.en: We estimate the cost to be five thousand dollars.
sentences.cn: 我们估计费用为5000美元.

sentences.en: We just need an estimate of the number of people who will come.
sentences.cn: 我们只需估算一下有多少人会来。

words.tran_cn: 可估计的；可尊敬的；有价值的

phrases.tran_cn: 不偏估计，公正（无偏）评价

trans.tran_cn: 估计，预测，报价，预算书，评价，判断
trans.tran_en: a calculation of the value, size, amount etc of something made using the information that you have, which may not be complete
a calculation of the value, size, amount etc of something made using the information that you have, which may not be complete

trans.tran_cn: 估计； 评价； 判断
trans.tran_en: a calculation of the value, size, amount etc of something made using the information that you have, which may not be complete
to try to judge the value, size, speed, cost etc of something, without calculating it exactly
a calculation of the value, size, amount etc of something made using the information that you have, which may not be complete
to try to judge the value, size, speed, cost etc of something, without calculating it exactly

trans.tran_cn: 估计，估算，评价，评论，估量，估价
trans.tran_en: to try to judge the value, size, speed, cost etc of something, without calculating it exactly
